page.title: 03Foxhall Stadium, Kesgrave
page.content: Foxhall Stadium is in our area. It is where the motor-cycle speedway races take place. The Â£Ipswich Witches' ride there and they are one of the best teams in England. The stadium can hold 10,000 people and each meeting is attended by 1000 - 10,000 people. The stadium was built in 1953 and before that it was just heathland. The stadium covers about 25 acres with heathland all around it. Five people work full-time at the stadium and between 50 and 100 work there part-time. There are three stands and it is possible to buy food and refreshments at the race meetings. Everyone enjoys watching and finds it very exciting. It is a dangerous sport and the worst accident was when someone was killed. The fences round the track have to be repaired quite often.
